name: opcua-2-azure
tagline: OPC-UA to Azure IoT Hub Bridge Application
body:
OPC UA to Microsoft Azure Bridge

This project is to create a simple bridge layer between an industrial OPC UA server and Azure IoT Hub, allowing easy transmission of industrial data to Microsoft's Cloud platform.

Dependencies: Free OPC UA, Azure IoT SDK, PYQT5

Subscribing to a node forwards all OPC UA updates to Azure IoT Hub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
